name: Hello Fruit
description:
Your fruit has gone missing from your farm. You need to find it and bring it back.

This is a really simple cute game. I had a lot of fun making it. This is my first 3d game and I really liked it. Also my first game using Godot.

Uses the limitation "every playthrough is unique". Even the start screen is different every time.

The native versions use Godot's better rendering engine so if you want better visuals give those a try.

I couldn't have done it without the great people who make the free assets I used.

3d models by: Quaternius

Sounds and music by: Sidearm Studios

Ultimate Sound FX Bundle

Font by: https://www.fontspace.com/letterstuff-type

license: Creative Commons (by-nd) Attribution No Derivatives

link: https://www.fontspace.com/really-font-f45186

Don't forget to wave and say hello to your fruit.
